body.name: Roll Up Over The Sink Dish Drying Rack Kitchen Rolling Dish Drainer, Foldable Sink Rack Mat Stainless Steel Wire for Kitchen Sink Counter (17.8"x11.8")
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 48 mins
features: Displayed Dimension:This dish drying rack measures 11.8"(L) X 17.8"(W) X 0.4"(H)" and fits sinks no larger than 16.8". Please kindly measure your sink size firstly before purchasing this roll up dish drying rack.

High Quality: Sink Dish Rack is made of 19 pcs food grade stainless steel pipes and silicone coating, durable, firm and safety. Its strong stainless steel composition gives it a great bearing capacity.
Multipurpose: Great for drying dishes, cups, just-wash vegetable or fruit. It also can be a heat-proof mat, protecting your counters from hot pans up to 400° F and more.
Foldable and Detachable Design: Soft silicone material can be cut according to the size you need. Foldable drying rack can be roll up easily, it made you kitchen look less cluttered and save space.
12 Months Warranty: Any quality problem(Non-artificial damage) please feel free to contact us, we will reply you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like it because it's not clunky. Taking up space. Good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something to avoid dishes being piled high to dry. I love how it's flat and easy to use. Rolls up for easy storage if need be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST sink accessory!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased the 20.8 in x 14.2 in for my Blanco Silgranit single bowl kitchen sink and I just love it! Sink outer dimensions are 33 in x 22 in. This sink rack fits perfectly. (Make sure to measure your sink and allow for at least 1 inch to rest on front and back of sink for adequate support.) It is great for prepping/drying fruits, veggies, etc. Also great for drying dishes, pots and pans. This rack expands the use of my sink and counter area for food prep or clean up. Can be folded up to reduce space and allow use of more sink bowl space but still have the use of the rack. Cleans very easily with soap and dish brush. Have not washed in DW yet but will try this soon. Only three sides rest on sink but it is still strong enough to support a cast iron skillet. I’m very picky about kitchen gadgets and am very pleased with the quality of this rack. No rust after three months of heavy use. No warping. This is the next best thing to a workstation sink! (If you’re not familiar with these, look them up - very cool!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, rolls up for size needed on counter
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this dish drying rack for months now, it works great for me. It isn't over bering in the counter. Easily rolls up and placed under counter or in a drawer, perfect for me. It's stainless steel so no rust, discoloring, or moldy surfaces, washes/wipes off easily. Big enough for large frying pans, just right for laying plates, bowls etc. silverware lays out just fine. It has rubber ends so it doesn't scratch my granite counter top. Yes, after you take dishes off of it you should wipe water off counter, but it's the same for those other dish racks. I love this stainless steel flat dish strainer/rack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great drying rack
reviews.reviewText: Works great for small sinks and to save space on counter tops when drying. Only thing is that it often leaves some white spots from dried up water but easy to wipe off. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was surprised and I like it.
reviews.reviewText: This is sturdier than I thought it would be. I wanted this because sometimes after you're done doing the dishes and put the dish rack away. You might have one or two dishes left over from coffee or whatever. You don't have to pull the dish rack back out. You can just wash those little bitty dishes and dry them over the sink instead of on the counter.On a paper towel for a kitchen towel. When i'm not using it it won't take up much room at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish I had one of these in my life sooner
reviews.reviewText: I freed up a lot of counter top space by getting rid of my old strainer, and this has almost added to it. I don't make many dishes and this is perfect for a plate, bowl, maybe a small sauce pan, and a couple cups.I also use it to water my plants and let them drain into the sink. It easily holds everything I've put on it - from 3 gallon jugs to heavy pots and pans. It's easy to clean and very light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gadget, great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a used one from Amazon Warehouse. It arrived missing the silicone mat and with water stains from prior use on the aluminum mat. So I returned it. The company's customer service contacted me via email and offered to send me another one at no charge. I assumed that some dishonest customer had returned the item in this condition, and Amazon hadn't caught the issues when restocking. Not the fault of the company distributing the item through Amazon but they took ownership anyway and reached out. Pretty awesome, esp given the serious decline in customer service everywhere these days. I took them up on their offer and a new one arrived in a few days. So 2 thumbs up for service.As far as the mat goes, we love it. It's a great way to air dry a few things, esp glasses whose insides don't dry on a traditional fabric mat on the counter. The silicone edges of the mat cling to the countertop and don't slip. It can roll up and sit next to the sink when not in use, but we've gotten in the habit of folding it in half and leaving it on the sink all the time. The bars are then spaced closer together so we can hang kitchen knives through them to air dry. The stainless steel rods do show water spots so you have to clean it with soap and water every now and then to keep it looking good. The silicone mat allows us to wash berries and drain them all in one step over the sink.Great kitchen gadget!

reviews.reviewTitle: This product is so smart and nice looking
reviews.reviewText: I like that it’s clean and can roll for a tidy area.
The width of the rack is 15.5" and not 18.1" as described.
